scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix backend run typecheck && npm --prefix frontend run typecheck
scripts.test: npm --prefix backend run test && npm --prefix frontend run test
scripts.test:coverage: npm --prefix backend run test:coverage && npm --prefix frontend run test:coverage
scripts.audit: npm audit --audit-level=high --omit=dev && npm --prefix backend audit --audit-level=high --omit=dev && npm --prefix frontend audit --audit-level=high --omit=dev
scripts.quality-gate: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run build
